name: Action Character - Guzman Demo
description:
Controls

Xbox controller

  • left joystick moves,
  • A starts combo attacks for Combo A, you can exit with a finisher by hitting B.
  • B starts combo attacks for Combo B, you can exit with a finisher by hitting A.
  • Y does a jump. 
  • X held does a dash.

Keyboard

  • WASD move.
  • Left Click -> A
  • Right Click -> B
  • Spacebar -> Jump.
  • F key -> Dash
  • F1 reloads scene.
  • M stops toggles the enemy movement.
  • 0 adds 10 more enemies
  • 9 removes 10 enemies

Also runs on Android (download the .apk).

base Action Character asset, https://ventedpennies.itch.io/action-character

Models and Animations for this version from, 

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/animations/powerful-sword-pack-great-sw...
